channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Attack on Dallas ICE Was ‘Very Definition of Terrorism,’ Prosecutor Says
item.description: Federal officials said the gunman intended to shoot immigration agents, calling it a “tragic irony” that three detainees were struck, one fatally.

item.title: 24 hours after shooting, migrants show up to ICE Dallas facility fearful of missing their appointments
item.description: The ICE facility in Dallas where three detainees were killed in a shooting on Wednesday is still closed, but many people with scheduled check-ins stil...

item.title: Dallas shooter sought to 'terrorize' ICE workers, official says
item.description: "I want to cause terror," the gunman behind Wednesday's deadly attack on a Dallas ICE immigration facility allegedly wrote in a note, according to aut...

item.title: Amazon to Pay $2.5 Billion in Prime Membership Settlement
item.description: The settlement is one of the largest in the history of the Federal Trade Commission, which sued Amazon two years ago.

item.title: Trump advises parents on hepatitis B vaccine. Here's why doctors say he's wrong
item.description: It's unusual for Presidents to give medical advise. But this week President Trump told parents to delay giving their kids a hep b shot until they turn...

item.title: Microsoft Disables Some Services to Israel’s Defense Ministry
item.description: Microsoft said it found that Israel was violating some terms of service for its products and that it does “not provide technology to facilitate mass s...

item.title: Israel Attacks Yemeni Capital, a Day After Houthi Drone Strike
item.description: The Israeli military said it was targeting sites linked to the Houthi militia, but a witness said a residential building was hit. A day earlier, a Hou...

item.title: Latest update of 1844 American songbook reflects new generation of 'Sacred Harp' singers
item.description: An 1844 religiously inspired songbook that uses shape notes to help people read music got a major update recently and it attracting younger singers.

item.title: The U.N. utters the word: Dementia
item.description: For the first time, the United Nations has issued a political declaration pledging to address dementia. Will it make a difference?

item.title: Trump Wades Into Bailout Politics in Offering a Lifeline to Argentina
item.description: A $20 billion loan to support Argentina’s president, Javier Milei, could come with economic and political risks.

item.title: Trump Wades Into Bailout Politics in Offering a Lifeline to Argentina
item.description: A $20 billion loan to support Argentina’s president, Javier Milei, could come with economic and political risks.
